headline: ComEd, Metropolitan Mayors Caucus Open Applications for Fifth Annual Powering the Holidays Grant Program
summary: CHICAGO, July 08, 2025--As the summer sun heats up northern Illinois communities, ComEd and the Metropolitan Mayors Caucus are already preparing for the sparkle of winter holidays, welcoming communities to apply for the fifth annual Powering the Holidays Grant Program. Applications are open now through August 29.
